p: For callus diameter, there were effects of 2,4-D, BA, and the interaction between these phytoregulators. The largest callus diameter (2.58 cm) was obtained in the treatment containing 2,4-D at 0.25 mg/L, without the addition of BA ( Table 1; Figure 1—T4). The increase in the concentrations of 2,4-D (above 0.25 mg·L −1) or the addition of BA to 2,4-D treatments did not increase callus diameter ( Table 1).
